LanguageData.XMT_ConsumeGenesDescription: Extract Genes into a Gene Ovamorph.
LanguageData.XMT_ParasiteCrushing: The Parasite is crushing {0} to stay secured!
LanguageData.XMT_CrawlDescription: Drop to all fours to improve speed.
LanguageData.XMT_ImplantDescription: Attempt attachment to a host for embryo implantation.
LanguageData.XMT_QueenDefendersArrived: A pack of {0} have come to defend their mother! They will hunt down all enemies who dared to harm her!
LanguageData.XMT_CommandMarkFriendDescription: Mark as friends of the family!
LanguageData.XMT_CommandMarkEnemyDescription: Mark as enemies of the family!
LanguageData.XMT_CommandInvestigateSiteDesc: No one seems to be home? that's odd.
LanguageData.XMT_LetterCaravanEnteredAftermathBase: The Settlement is eeriely quiet, the area pockmarked with signs of corrosive acid burned into the ground.
LanguageData.XMT_LetterCaravanAttackedByBase: Negotiations with {1} have broken down, and they are attacking {0}!
LanguageData.XMT_RitualTargetJellyInfo: You need {0} jelly for each participant ({1} total).
LanguageData.XMT_RitualTargetJellyInfoAppend: A participant cannot reach enough jelly.
LanguageData.XMT_QueenAscensionLetterDescription: {PAWN_labelShort} has finished her advancement, her voice now commands all cryptimorphs on the planet.
LanguageData.XMT_HiveRisesLetterDescription: The prey has been overcome and this nesting site is now secure, gather more hosts, grow the family, ascend!
LanguageData.XMT_HumanRebellionLetterDescription: The prey are not yet docile! Some have turned violent in the face of your ascendency and must be repelled or contained!
LanguageData.XMT_MessageCannotStartJellyExtraction: {PAWN_nameDef}'s metabolism cannot yet produce more jelly.
LanguageData.XMT_MessagePawnHadNotEnoughToProduceJell: {PAWN_nameDef}'s metabolism is not recovered enough to produce jelly.
LanguageData.XMT_MessageCannotStartResinExtraction: {PAWN_nameDef}'s metabolism cannot yet produce more resin.
LanguageData.XMT_MessagePawnHadNotEnoughToProduceResi: {PAWN_nameDef}'s metabolism is not recovered enough to produce resin.
